00093     // ************************ geometry functions **********************
00094     //
00097     inline int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00098                       EGS_Float &t, int *newmed) {
00099         return g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed);
00100     };
00103     inline EGS_Float hownear(int ireg,const EGS_Vector &x) {
00104         return g->hownear(ireg,x);
00105     };
00107     inline int getMedium(int ireg) {
00108         return g->medium(ireg);
00109     };

00233 #define APP_MAIN(app_name) \
00234     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
00235         app_name app(argc,argv); \
00236         app.run(); \
00237         app.reportResults(); \
00238         app.finish(); \
00239         return 0; \
00240     }
00241 
00242 #define APP_LIB(app_name) \
00243     extern "C" {\
00244         APP_EXPORT EGS_SimpleApplication* createApplication(int argc, char **argv) {\
00245             return new app_name(argc,argv);\
00246         }\
00247     }
